definition[0]: a dark grey rock that can easily be split into flat thin pieces
definition[1]: a small piece of slate or similar material that is used for covering roofs
example[0]: There were several slates missing from the roof.
definition[2]: a list of people that voters can choose in an election, or who are being considered for an important job
definition[3]: a small black board or a flat piece of slate in a wooden frame, used for writing on in the past
definition[4]: to criticize a book, film etc severely, especially in a newspaper
example[1]: Dohertyâ€™s most recent novel has been slated by the critics.
